    "status": 200,
    "message": "List Jurnal berhasil didapatkan",
    "data": {
        "totalRecords": 8,
        "data": [
            {
                "_id": "67697c4ece2a4f39e4dce434",
                "status": "Diproses",
                "konten": "Laboriosam truculenter venustas cogito cohaero curso demonstro apostolus arma odio. Argumentum ater confero sto. Supra adsidue beatae certe verecundia cerno.",

                    "/private/var/exaggerate_until_colon.pptx"
                ],

                "createdAt": "2024-12-23T15:05:50.486Z",

            },
            {
                "_id": "67697c4ece2a4f39e4dce435",
                "status": "Diproses",
                "konten": "Ex harum vito spoliatio adopto amo. Appello turbo adinventitias. Curo tenax cubicularis comptus subiungo acerbitas pecus.",
                "attachments": [
                    "/var/yp/boohoo.woff2"
